name: MateVanKritiekZijnCodelijst-to-allergy-intolerance-criticality
title: HCIM MateVanKritiekZijnCodelijst to allergy-intolerance-criticality
description: Maps the HCIM AllergyIntolerance release 2017 terminology for AllergyCriticalExtent to the FHIR STU3 terminology associated with `AllergyIntolerance.criticality`. Known issue: this ConceptMap contains concepts that should not have been included but cannot as of yet be removed due to the backwards compatibility of this ConceptMap. See https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1731 for more details.
purpose: To aid in mapping from HCIM AllergyIntolerance value set MateVanKritiekZijnCodelijst to FHIR STU3 `AllergyIntolerance.criticality`.
